x.Description: Position along the x-axis in subject's T1w ScanRAS coordinate system

y.Description: Position along the y-axis in subject's T1w ScanRAS coordinate system

z.Description: Position along the z-axis in subject's T1w ScanRAS coordinate system

size.Description: Surface area of the electrode, in mm^2

group.Description: Group of channels electrode belongs to (same shank)

hemisphere.Description: The hemisphere in which the electrode is placed

WM.Description: The electrode is located in white matter

SOZ.Description: The electrode is located in the seizure onset zone

EZ.Description: The electrode is located in the epileptogenic zone
